mapper.update:
update merchant
merchants_no = #{merchantsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fk_client_id = #{fkClientId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
no_withdrawal_money = #{noWithdrawalMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cash_advance_money = #{cashAdvanceMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
frozen_money = #{frozenMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
guarantee_money = #{guaranteeMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
merchants_level = #{merchantsLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
desc_score = #{descScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
service_score = #{serviceScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logistics_score = #{logisticsScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = now(),
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where pk_merchants_id = #{pkMerchantsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
